title: Shopee Product Performance Daily Report
description: Daily report presenting the performance metrics for a specific product on Shopee

merchantID.description: A unique merchant code for GRAAS clients

siteNickNameId.description: A unique merchant's store code for GRAAS clients

Item_ID.description: Unique identifier for the product item on Shopee

Product.description: Name or title of the product

Variation_ID.description: Unique identifier for the product variation (if applicable)

Variation_Name.description: Name of the product variation (if applicable)

SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product

Product_Visitors_Visit.description: Total number of visitors to the product

Product_Page_Views.description: Total number of page views for the product

Product_Bounce_Visitors.description: Total number of visitors who bounced from the product page

Product_Bounce_Rate.description: Bounce rate for the product page as a percentage

Search_Clicks.description: Total number of clicks on search related to the product

Likes.description: Total number of likes received for the product

Product_Visitors_Add_to_Cart.description: Total number of visitors who added the product to the cart

Units_Add_to_Cart.description: Total number of units added to the cart for the product

Conversion_Rate_Add_to_Cart.description: Conversion rate from product view to adding to cart as a percentage

Buyers_Placed_Order.description: Total number of buyers who placed an order for the product

Units_Placed_Order.description: Total number of units placed in orders for the product

Sales_Placed_Order.description: Sales amount information for placed orders

Conversion_Rate_Placed_Order.description: Conversion rate from product view to placing an order as a percentage

Buyers_Paid_Order.description: Total number of buyers who paid for the orders for the product

Units_Paid_Order.description: Total number of units paid for the orders for the product

Sales_Paid_Order.description: Sales amount information for paid orders

Conversion_Rate_Paid_Order.description: Conversion rate from placing an order to paying for the order as a percentage

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'
